body_html: @alsrgv The terminal state for DataType is that it will be an open data type, so yeah, that particular use is not going to work, if you're tracking master, use scalar_type() method instead. (This will fail if you get any dtype which is not in the ScalarType set.)
body_text: @alsrgv The terminal state for DataType is that it will be an open data type, so yeah, that particular use is not going to work, if you're tracking master, use scalar_type() method instead. (This will fail if you get any dtype which is not in the ScalarType set.)
body: @alsrgv The terminal state for DataType is that it will be an open data type, so yeah, that particular use is not going to work, if you're tracking master, use `scalar_type()` method instead. (This will fail if you get any dtype which is not in the ScalarType set.)
